title: Hello and welcome!
text:
I’m thrilled to have you visit my personal website. As a dedicated and passionate professional, I’m eager to introduce myself and provide you with a glimpse of what I bring to the table.
NM2207 Folders

Who I Am
I’m Han Yiyi, an enthusiastic and professional linguist and translator.





Here’s a picture of me


I come from China, and I’m studying BA in English Language at National University of Singapore.
My journey in this field has been marked by a deep commitment to continuous learning and growth, and I’m constantly seeking new opportunities to expand my horizons.


What I Can Do
Fields to Work In: Translation, Interpreting, Linguistic Research, Creative Writing, Public Relations, Publicity, Design …
Languages: English (Fluent, IELTS 8/9), Mandarin (Native), Cantonese (Fair), French (Basic)
IT Skills: Competent use of Microsoft Office packages and video editing tools


Let’s Connect
I’m always open to new connections and opportunities. Feel free to explore my website to learn more about my background, projects, and interests. If you believe that I could be a valuable asset to your organization or if you’d like to discuss potential collaborations, please don’t hesitate to get in touch with me.

title: Visualizations
text:
Eating disorder trends around the world

Number of patients in different countries

I will use the “SelectInput” feature in shiny to provide a row of labels representing different countries. Viewers can click on those labels like “the US” “the UK” “Germany” to see trends in specific countries they want to explore.
